mapper.insert: insert into MT_CUSTOMER_REQUIREMENTS (NAME, CONTACT_WAY, PROJECT_TITLE, PROJECT_DETAIL, STATUS, REMARK) values ( #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update MT_CUSTOMER_REQUIREMENTS set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_WAY = #{contactWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_TITLE = #{projectTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_DETAIL = #{projectDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where REQ_ID = #{reqId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select REQ_ID, NAME, CONTACT_WAY, PROJECT_TITLE, PROJECT_DETAIL, STATUS, REMARK from MT_CUSTOMER_REQUIREMENTS
